display_long_description:
It’s time to get on the most nostalgic gaming ride of your life! On this Virtual Reality nostalgia trip, you have to join forces with our hero Dot to save the gaming world as we know it from the clutches of the evil Cyblin Lord and become the hero of Far-of-a-Land! During your adventures, you’ll find unique characters, games, and gaming systems that will guide you throughout the good ol’ 90s!

- Explore the human world in full virtual reality
- The gaming and human worlds collide and you have to manage each situation in this game within a game
- Get inside a plethora of 16 and 32-bit games and adapt to each genre they bring to the table
- Discover the lore of the Pixel Ripped franchise in this rich story full of plot twists and funny moments
- Witness loads of WTF moments that will get you laughing while playing
- Gorgeous scenarios with a vibing soundtrack
- 8 languages support for in-game interface and subtitles! (English, Brazilian Portuguese, French, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean and Simplified Chinese)
- Amazing 90fps on Quest 2!
